text: E'ina hu'negu Ra Anumzamo'a amanage hu'ne. Nagri narimpa ahe'zamo'a tusiza huno teve rukru nehianki'na, ama kumapima mani'naza vahete'ene zagagafare'ene zafaraminte'ene hozafi ne'zaraminte'enena ana narimpa ahe'zana eri kaha hutresugeno, tevegna huno akrukru huno neresigeno mago vahe'mo'a rusura osugahie.
